statements: SELECT * FROM lyrics_compositions;
SELECT id, composer, release_date FROM lyrics_compositions;
SELECT lyrics, genre FROM lyrics_compositions ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM lyrics_compositions WHERE composer = 'John Doe';
SELECT lyrics, composer FROM lyrics_compositions WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY composer ASC;
SELECT * FROM lyrics_compositions WHERE composer = 'John Doe';
SELECT lyrics, composer FROM lyrics_compositions WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM lyrics_compositions ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT * FROM lyrics_compositions WHERE composer LIKE '%Smith%' AND genre = 'Pop';
SELECT composer, COUNT(*) AS num_compositions FROM lyrics_compositions GROUP BY composer HAVING num_compositions > 1 ORDER BY num_compositions DESC;
SELECT id, lyric_text, musical_composition_id FROM Lyrics;
SELECT musical_composition_id, id, lyric_text FROM Lyrics;
SELECT composition_title, composer_name, id FROM MusicalCompositions;
SELECT * FROM Lyrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT composition_title, composer_name FROM MusicalCompositions WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM MusicalCompositions WHERE composer_name = 'Beethoven';
SELECT composition_title, composer_name FROM MusicalCompositions ORDER BY composer_name ASC;
SELECT lyric_text FROM Lyrics WHERE musical_composition_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT composition_title, COUNT(id) AS num_lyrics FROM MusicalCompositions LEFT JOIN Lyrics ON MusicalCompositions.id = Lyrics.musical_composition_id GROUP BY composition_title HAVING num_lyrics > 3;
SELECT composition_title, composer_name FROM MusicalCompositions WHERE id IN (SELECT musical_composition_id FROM Lyrics WHERE id = 5);
SELECT * FROM lyrics WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT lyrics_text FROM lyrics WHERE id = 2;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE id = 3;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT id, title FROM compositions ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre='Rock' ORDER BY artist_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lyrics_text FROM lyrics WHERE artist_id=2;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_compositions FROM artists JOIN compositions ON artists.id = compositions.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY total_compositions DESC;
SELECT artist_name, lyrics_text FROM artists INNER JOIN lyrics ON artists.id = lyrics.artist_id WHERE genre='Pop' AND artist_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY artist_name, lyrics_text DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lyrics_text FROM lyrics WHERE artist_id IN (SELECT id FROM artists WHERE genre='Rap') ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Lyrics;
SELECT song_title FROM Songs WHERE song_id = 1;
SELECT composer_name FROM Composers WHERE composer_id = 2;
SELECT album_title, release_year FROM Albums WHERE release_year < 2000;
SELECT lyric_text, composer_name FROM Lyrics INNER JOIN Composers ON Lyrics.composer_id = Composers.composer_id;
SELECT * FROM Lyrics ORDER BY lyric_id DESC;
SELECT Songs.song_title, Composers.composer_name FROM Songs INNER JOIN Composers ON Songs.composer_id = Composers.composer_id WHERE Songs.song_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;

SELECT Lyrics.lyric_text, Songs.song_title, Composers.composer_name FROM Lyrics INNER JOIN Songs ON Lyrics.lyric_id = Songs.lyric_id INNER JOIN Composers ON Songs.composer_id = Composers.composer_id WHERE Composers.composer_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY Lyrics.lyric_id ASC;
SELECT Albums.album_title, COUNT(Songs.song_id) AS total_songs FROM Albums INNER JOIN Songs ON Albums.song_id = Songs.song_id GROUP BY Albums.album_title HAVING total_songs > 5;
SELECT Songs.song_title, COUNT(*) AS total_lyrics FROM Songs INNER JOIN Lyrics ON Songs.lyric_id = Lyrics.lyric_id GROUP BY Songs.song_title ORDER BY total_lyrics DESC;
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT title, artist FROM Songs WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT song_id, genre FROM Songs WHERE artist = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT lyrics FROM Lyrics WHERE song_id = 1;
SELECT tempo, sentiment FROM AnalysisResults WHERE song_id = 3;
SELECT title, artist, genre FROM Songs;
SELECT name FROM Composers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT lyrics FROM Lyrics WHERE song_id = 5;
SELECT tempo, sentiment FROM AnalysisResults WHERE tempo > 120;
SELECT title, artist, tempo, sentiment FROM Songs JOIN AnalysisResults ON Songs.song_id = AnalysisResults.song_id;
